question: Which of the following reaction/s does not yield an amine?
I. <katex>$R-X + NH_3 \xrightarrow{\Delta}$</katex>
II. <katex>$R-CN \xrightarrow{H_2/Ni}$</katex>
III. <katex>$R-C \equiv N + H_2O \xrightarrow{H^+}$</katex>
IV. <katex>$R-CONH_2 \xrightarrow{LiAlH_4}$</katex>
explanation: Reaction III is the hydrolysis of a nitrile, which yields a Carboxylic Acid (<katex>$R-COOH$</katex>), not an amine.
